Board Quizz Adventure (FR)

Board Quizz Adventure (FR)

Request Press Copy

Description

Board Quizz Adventure is a fun little party game, perfect to play while having a drink with friends. It’s very accessible to everyone, even people not used to playing video games: you can play without holding a controller. Answer questions to clear the way and reach the objective first!

History

At first this project was a game I made in a hurry right before New Year's Eve, so we could play it with friends. It had some issues, but the core of the game worked well and we had a really good time, so I decided to make a polished version of it that I could share on Steam. From the start this game has been about simple fun with friends, so I focused on keeping it this way.

Features

  • Very accessible, everyone can play (even if they never played video games before).
  • Local multiplayer up to an unlimited number of players with only 2 controllers or a keyboard.
  • Quick and easy 3 minutes tutorial.
  • 30 unique maps.
  • 5 unique map mechanics.
  • Fully available in English and French.
